H0.text: which president of the united states was a boy scout. John F. Kennedy

H1.text: which president of the united states was a boy scout. Dwight D. Eisenhower

H2.text: which president of the united states was a boy scout. Harry S. Truman

H3.text: which president of the united states was a boy scout. Gerald Ford

A4.text: Having served as a Boy Scout during his childhood, Kennedy was active in the Boston Council from 1946 to 1955 as district vice chairman, member of the executive board, vice-president, and National Council Representative.
